text: Masiha bina mariyama ta matra paigambara (duta) hun aru kehi ho'inan. Unibhanda agadi pani dherai paigambaraharu gujrisakeka chan ra unaki ama allahaki satyanistha ajnakari nari thi'in, duvai khana khanthe. Hera, hamile yiniharuka lagi tarkaharu kasari rakhdachaum. Pheri vicara garnus ki yiniharu kasari tyasala'i inkara gardachan
